item.title: Apprentice's Wand
item.fluff: This simple length of wood appears in your hand when you need it most

block.name: Property
block.line: You can attune this wand to yourself during a short rest. It can be attuned to only one person at a time, and attuning it to one person breaks the attunement to the previous person.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: This wand must be attuned to you.
Effect: The wand is transported to your hand from anywhere on the same plane.
Special: You can use this power even when the wand is not in your possession.

item.title: Autumn Harvest Totem
item.fluff: This totem is fashioned from leaves and bone shards to embody the spirit of autumn and the inevitability of death

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a bloodied creature

block.name: Property
block.line: Your attacks using this totem deal +2 additional damage against bloodied creatures.
Level 12 or 17: +5 additional damage.
Level 22 or 27: +8 additional damage.

item.title: Avenging Ash Totem
item.fluff: The ashes staining the totem remind you of civilization's ravages against nature

block.name: Property
block.line: Your primal attacks using this totem deal +2 additional damage against contructs and objects.
Level 12 or 17: +5 additional damage.
Level 22 or 27: +8 additional damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this totem
Effect: The triggering enemy takes 5 additional fire damage. If the triggering attack is a primal attack and the triggering enemy is a construct, the enemy also takes ongoing 5 fire damage.
Level 12 or 17: 10 additional fire damage; ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 22 or 27: 20 additional fire damage; ongoing 15 fire damage.

item.title: Aversion Staff
item.fluff: While you wield this staff, any foe afflicted by your powers is reluctant to attack you

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against attacks from enemies that are subject to effects you caused using this staff or that are in zones you created using this staff.

item.title: Balance Totem
item.fluff: Reflecting the balance between civilization and the wilderness, half of this totem is carved with runes, and the other half is unshaped except by nature

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a primal implement power using this implement

Effect: Close burst 10 (an ally adjacent to either you or the triggering enemy); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and regains additional hit points equal to twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Belled Branch
item.fluff: this silver tree branch, strung with tiny golden bells, hangs from a simple chain and allows safe prayer in the heat of battle

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +4 item bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by using a ranged or area divine power with this implement.

item.title: Blazing Arc Ki Focus
item.fluff: When you grasp this white rock and focus on its power by enduring the charring heat within it, you mold your ki into a thing of fire

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a melee attack using this ki focus
Effect: The triggering attack deals fire damage instead of any other damage type, gains the Fire keyword, and loses any other damage type keywords.

item.title: Boar's Charge Totem
item.fluff: When you grasp this boar's tusk, your heart races with feral excitement and you throw yourself headling into battle

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus on a charge attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When charging while you are in beast form, you gain a +1 item bonus to speed.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a charge attack using this totem while you are in beast form
Effect: You push the triggering enemy 1 square and can shift into the space vacated.
Level 23 or 28: Push 2 squares.

item.title: Book of Knowledge
item.fluff: This book contains many more secrets that can physically fit on its pages

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Knowledge checks and monster knowledge checks

item.title: Bright Jewel
item.fluff: When you focus your mind, this jewel on a silver chain bloows with bright light

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d6 radiant damage per plus if you worship a deity of the Light domain

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Requirement: You must worship a deity of the Light domain.
Trigger: You score a critical hit against an enemy with a Radiant attack using this holy symbol
Effect:Effect: The triggering enemy is stunned until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Cascading Strikes Ki Focus
item.fluff: Your wide strike triggers this stout stone idol to release its power, helping you land a blow that would otherwise go astray

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You miss with an attack using this ki focus
Effect: You reroll the triggering attack roll, using the second result even if it is lower.

item.title: Certainty of Death Ki Focus
item.fluff: You gaze at the statuette with a hole where its heart should be and look into yourself, focusing your ki on the void of life within it

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your dark reaping racial power
Effect: You gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn against one creature adjacent to the creature that triggered your dark reaping.

item.title: Cobra Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This clay serpent drips with a strange venom - by pressing your finger into its fangs, you unlock the serpents's mysteries

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Poison effects.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
Effect: The triggering enemy also takes ongoing poison damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals 2 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
Level 12 or 17: The ongoing damage equals 5 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
Level 22 or 27: The ongoing damage equals 10 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

item.title: Dark Hunger Ki Focus
item.fluff: As you study the intricate runes carved into the surface of this dire wolf fang, you can feel the savage beast begin to stir within you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you trigger your blood drinker Vampire attack power with an attack made with this ki focus, you roll d12s instead of d10s for that power's damage.

item.title: Death Fang Implement
item.fluff: A wounded or vulnerable foe grants you advantage while you wield this implement of bone, teeth, and sinew

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against a target granting combat advantage to you

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You bloody an enemy with an attack using this implement
Effect: The triggering enemy grants combat advantage to you (save ends).

item.title: Death Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: As you work the gray soil contained in this small wooden box into your hands, you focus your ki on matters of the grave

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a melee attack using this ki focus
Effect: The triggering attack deals necrotic damage instead of any other damage type, gains the Necrotic keyword, and loses any other damage type keywords.

item.title: Defensive Staff
item.fluff: This staff increases your resistance to all types of attacks

headline.name: Critical:
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have the Staff of Defense class feature

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses.
If you have the Staff of Defense class feature, you also gain a +1 item bonus to AC.

item.title: Earthroot Staff
item.fluff: This staff is as light as wood, but it seems to be made of earth and stone with a fine crystal atop it, and it can bind your enemies to the earth and protect you against them

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or the target is restrained until the end of your next turn

block.name: Property
block.line: Any target you immobilize, petrify, slow, or restrain with a power using this staff takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against that condition.

item.title: Emerald Flame Ki Focus
item.fluff: A flickering, yellow flame dances within this green gem's facets, hinting at the magic that can be unleashed only by one with the focus needed to study the flame's secrets

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You are hit by an attack
Effect: Close burst 1 (each enemy in burst); Each target takes 5 fire damage. You then shift 2 squares.
Level 12 or 17: 10 fire damage.
Level 22 or 27: 15 fire damage.

item.title: Enduring Implement
item.fluff: Holding this implement allows you to endure suffering to accomplish your goals

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus while bloodied

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are bloodied during an encounter
Effect: You gain a power bonus to Implement damage rolls using this implement until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals your Constitution modifier.
Level 13 or 18: Equals 2 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 23 or 28: Equals 4 + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Enduring Hatred Implement
item.fluff: A broken holy symbol represents a long-standing grudge against heaven's immortals

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against an immortal creature

block.name: Property
block.line: Any enemy you bloody with an attack using this implement takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18: -2 penalty.
|i>Level 23 or 28: -3 penalty.

item.title: Envenomed Ki Focus
item.fluff: This item looks like a bracelet made of green-tinted steel in the shape of a thorny vine with the surface etched with magical teachings that fill your ki with venom

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make a poison damage roll using this ki focus, you gain an item bonus to the damage roll equal to the ki focus' plus.

item.title: Fell Beast Totem
item.fluff: This totem is infused with venom extracted from corrupted predators of the swamp

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: The first time you hit with a primal attack using this totem during your current turn, each creature you hit takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Level 13 or 18: Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 23 or 28: Ongoing 15 poison damage.

item.title: Final Sleep Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small manual's plain, black leather covers contain illustrations of the vulnerable points on a variety of creatures, the contents changing each time you open the book

block.name: Property
block.line: When you reduce an enemy to 5 hit points or fewer with an attack using this ki focus, you instead reduce it to 0 hit points.
Level 13 or 18: To 10 hit points or fewer.
Level 23 or 28: To 15 hit points or fewer.

item.title: Flame Wand
item.fluff: Small flames become conflagrations when channeled through this wand

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with Fire powers using this wand

block.name: Scorching Burst
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Effect: The area becomes a zone of flames until the start of your next turn.
A creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: 3 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.
Level 23 or 28: 6 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.

item.title: Force Staff
item.fluff: Use this staff to knock down your enemies and drag them across the ground

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, or the target is knocked prone

block.name: Property
block.line: If you score a critical hit with a Force attack, you both deal the additional damage and knock the target prone.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with a Force power
Effect: You slide the target a number of squares equal to this staff's enchancement bonus.

item.title: Force Wand
item.fluff: With this wand, your force powers pack a bigger punch

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with Force powers using this wand, and the damage dealt by magic missile

block.name: Magic Missile
block.line: Effect: Ranged 20 (one creature); 4 + your Intelligence modifier force damge.
Level 8: 6 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 13: 9 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 18: 11 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 23: 15 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 28: 17 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.

item.title: Four Winds Ki Focus
item.fluff: Channeling the power of air and sky, you command the four winds to speed your strikes and whisk you to safety

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and you slide the target 1 square per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
Effect: You fly a number of squares equal 1 + this ki focus's enhancement bonus. This counts as shifting. You must land at the end of this movement or you fall.

item.title: Ghost Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This white orb seems little more than a worthless bauble, but when you focus on it, you see paths where the dead walk

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you make a melee attack using this ki focus against an insubstantial creature granting combat advantage to you, that attack ignores the insubstantial quality.

item.title: Hellfire Wand
item.fluff: Your fires burn with the fury of the Nine Hells when wielding this wand

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire damage per plus, or +1d8 fire damage per plus with Fire powers

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with Fire powers using this wand

block.name: Hellish Rebuke
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Effect: Each time you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: 4 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.
Level 23 or 28: 8 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.

item.title: Hexer's Rod
item.fluff: Crafted in ancient times by goblin shamans, this rod channels their tricky, underhanded magic

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this rod
Effect: You can use the following action once before the end of the encounter, with the triggering enemy as the target:
Immediate Reaction: Trigger: The target misses you with an attack; You shift 2 squares and gain concealment against the target until the start of its next turn.
Level 13 or 18: Shift 3 squares.
Level 23 or 28: Shift 4 squares.

item.title: Hungry Spirits Totem
item.fluff: The appearance of this totem changes week by week, depending on which spirits are hungriest

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with Spirit attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this totem, you can move your spirit companion to a space adjacent ot the target as a free reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion with a primal attack using this totem
Effect: You and one ally within 2 squares of your spirit companion can spend a healing surge to regain hit points. Each target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Hunting Panther Ki Focus
item.fluff: These mummified eyeballs tucked inside a worn wooden box see through your enemy's deceptions

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target that has cover or concealment

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this focus
Effect: The target cannot benefit from concealment or cover until it hits you with an attack or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first.

item.title: Impeding Ki Focus
item.fluff: This jade figurine serves as a convenient target dummy, allowing you to focus your ki on making the most of a foe's vulnerabilities

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, you can roll twice and use the higher result if the target is dazed or stunned

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls using this ki focus with melee attacks against dazed or stunned enemies.
Level 13 or 18: +4 bonus to damage rolls.
Level 23 or 28: +6 bonus to damage rolls.
You gain one-half the bonus with your Flurry of Blows power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your Flurry of Blows class power
Effect: During your current turn, each bloodied enemy you damage with your Flurry of Blows cannot regain hit points until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Implement of Reproach
item.fluff: This implement delivers a debilitating attack that saps your enemy's vitality and impairs its ability to persevere

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack delivered by this implement
Effect: The triggering enemy is debilitated until the end of your next turn.
While debilitated, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to all saving throws and cannot regain hit points by any means.

item.title: Implement of Supplementary Force
item.fluff: This implement crafted from scarlet glass pulses with barely controlled energy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your current turn, each enemy you hit with an arcane close blast attack using this implement is knocked prone after all other effects of the attack have been resolved.

item.title: Implement of Sweet Sanctuary
item.fluff: This silvery sheen of this implement grows to surround you at your command, warding off danger

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain a bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals 3 + this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Tongues
item.fluff: Language is no barrier while you wield this tome

block.name: Property
block.line: You are understood, even if you do not speak a language the listener can speak. The listener must still understand at least one language.

item.title: Ioun-Blessed Symbol
item.fluff: This symbol, blessed with Ioun's love of knowledge, is a slender of ivory with only a suggestion of her icon

block.name: Property
block.line: An arcane character can wield this symbol in hand, treating it as a wand implement.

item.title: Ironscar Rod
item.fluff: This heavy iron ron, shaped like two twisting serpents, scours enemies with acid

block.name: Property
block.line: This rod counts as the mace simple weapon.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit a creature with an attack using this rod
Effect: The triggering creature takes an extra +1d8 acid damage from the triggering attack, and a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18: +2d8 acid damage.
Level 23 or 28: +3d8 acid damage.

item.title: Lightning Wand
item.fluff: With this wand, your lightning powers crackle with extra energy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 lightning damage per plus, or +1d8 lightning damage per plus with Lightning powers

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with Lightning powers using this wand

block.name: Arc Lightning
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10/20 (one creature, or two creatures within 5 squares of each other); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

Effect: If you targeted two creatures, both creatures take lightning damage at the end of each creature's turn if they are within 5 squares of each other. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn, and the damage equals your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Sustain Standard: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.
In addition, you pull each creature two squares towards each other. If they end the pull adjacent to each other, both take 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

item.title: Magic Holy Symbol
item.fluff: A holy symbol of your god, enchanted with magical power

item.title: Magic Ki Focus
item.fluff: A minor focus, enchanted to help channel mystical power

item.title: Magic Orb
item.fluff: A standard crystal orb, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Rod
item.fluff: A standard rod, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Staff
item.fluff: A staff, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Tome
item.fluff: An enchanted tome, filled with elementary magical lore

item.title: Magic Totem
item.fluff: This item is a simple totem that channels primal energy

item.title: Magic Wand
item.fluff: A basic wand, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Manual of Ninjutsu
item.fluff: The most basic manual of the ninja teaches the secret of using the shadows as a weapon

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your assassin's strike class power and the target is granting you combat advantage, you can reroll any 1 on the power's damage dice until that die's result is anything else than a 1.
Level 13 or 18: Reroll any 1 or 2 until that die's result is anything else than a 1 or 2.
Level 23 or 28: Reroll any 1, 2 or 3 until that die's result is anything else than a 1, 2 or 3.

item.title: Master's Wand of Cloud of Daggers
item.fluff: Your cloud of daggers strikes with deadly accuracy

block.name: Property
block.line: The zone created by your cloud of daggers deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

block.name: Cloud of Daggers
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (one creature in the center square); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Effect: The area creates a zone of whirling force daggers until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain, and a creature that ends its turn in the zone takes force damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: Equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28: Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Dire Radiance
item.fluff: Your dire radiance presses against foes with an invisible force

block.name: Property
block.line: Each square that a target affected by your dire radiance moves towards you costs 1 additional square of movement, instead of just the first square.

block.name: Dire Radiance
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: Equal to 6 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28: Equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Eldritch Combat
item.fluff: Your eldritch combat power viciously scours your enemies

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with eldritch blast, eldritch bolt, and eldritch strike

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: When this wand is created, the creator chooses either eldritch blast, eldritch bolt, or eldritch strike. You gain the chosen power as an encounter power.

item.title: Mindshield Implement
item.fluff: This elaborate implement feels right in your hands, but at the same time dreamlike and unnaturally light, as if only partially real

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Saving throws against Charm and Illusion effects

block.name: Property
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this implement, you and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one Charm or Illusion, even if that effect normally does not end on a save.

item.title: Nature Protector's Effigy
item.fluff: This egg-shaped white stone has a carving of an oak leaf that turns green when surrounded by nature

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You teleport up to 5 squares to a space adjacent to a plant or a plant creature that is Small or larger.
Level 13 or 18: Up to 10 squares.
Level 23 or 28: Up to 20 squares.

item.title: Master's Wand of Ethereal Chill
item.fluff: Your ethereal chill also empower's your ally's attack

block.name: Property
block.line: The ally in the center square of your ethereal chill power deals additional cold damage on the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The additional damage equals your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Ethereal Chill
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 centered on an ally within 5 squares (creatures in the burst other than the center ally); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus cold damage.
Level 23 or 28: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, each time an enemy hits or misses the center ally with a melee attack, it takes cold damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 13 or 18: 3 + your Wisdom modifier cold damage.
Level 23 oe 28: 6 + your Wisdom modifier cold damage.

item.title: Master's Wand of Eyebite
item.fluff: Your eyebite spell occludes you just a moment longer than normal

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit a target with your eyebite power using this wand, you gain combat advantage on your first attack roll against the target after the invisibility ends and before the end of your next turn.

block.name: Eyebite
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.
Miss: You gain concealment against the target until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Hellish Rebuke
item.fluff: Your hellish rebuke consumes your attacker and its nearby allies

block.name: Property
block.line: When the target of your hellish rebuke power takes fire damage because an enemy damages you, its allies adjacent to it also take one-half the fire damage.

block.name: Hellish Rebuke
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Effect: Each time you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes fire damage. The damage equals your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: Equals 4 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28: Equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Force Missiles
item.fluff: Your missiles of arcane force impact with the force of a rushing bull

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit a target with your force projectile, or damage a target with your magic missile, you can push the target 1 square.
Level 23 or 28: Push 2 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: When this wand is created, the creator chooses either force projectile or magic missile. You gain the chosen power as an encounter power.

item.title: Master's Wand of Ray of Frost
item.fluff: Your ray of frost covers the target in so much ice that it can become a hindrance to its allies

block.name: Property
block.text: While the target of your ray of frost power is slowed by that power, it provides cover against attacks by its allies and its allies cannot move through its space.

block.name: Ray of Frost
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Level 23 or 28: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Effect: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Scorching Burst
item.fluff: Your scorching burst burns devastatingly hot at its core

block.name: Property
block.line: The center square of the zone created by your scorching burst burns extra hot. A creature that ends its turn occupying the center square takes additional fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

block.name: Scorching Burst
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in burst); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Effect: The area becomes a zone of flames until the start of your next turn.
A creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18: Equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28: Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Staggering Note
item.fluff: Your staggering note includes a perfect cue for your ally to strike

block.name: Property
block.line: When an ally makes a melee basic attack as part of your staggering note power, he or she gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

block.name: Staggering Note
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit: Charisma modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Level 23 or 28: Push 3 squares.
One ally you can see can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free interrupt either before, during, or after the forced movement.
Miss: One ally you can see can make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

item.title: Master's Wand of Static Shock
item.fluff: The hindering charge of your static shock does not dissipate as easily

block.name: Property
block.line: The target of your static shock power suffers the attack penalty until it misses an attack or until the end of your next turn, whichever comes first.

block.name: Static Shock
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the first attack the target makes before the end of your next turn takes a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier on the attack roll.
Level 23 or 28: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Miss: Half the penalty.

item.title: Master's Wand of Thunderwave
item.fluff: This wand grants the ability to reshape your thunderwave power

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your thunderwave power, you can choose to use it as a close burst 1 instead of a close blast.

block.name: Thunderwave
block.line: Attack: Close blast 3 (each creature in the blast); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 23 or 28: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.
Miss: You push the target half the distance.

item.title: Master's Wand of Vicious Mockery
item.fluff: Your vicious mockery drives an enemy into a reckless rage

block.name: Property
block.line: The target of your vicious mockery power grants combat advantage for the first attack made against it while it is suffering from the penalty to attack.

block.name: Vicious Mockery
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Miss: The target takes a -2 penalty to the first attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Obsidian Wand
item.fluff: When you channel magic through this wand, you feel it grow as cold as the grave

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d10 + 5 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18: 2d10 + 9 necrotic damage.
Level 23 or 28: 3d10 + 12 necrotic damage.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is weakened for the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn.
Effect: If the target was reduced to 10 hit points or fewer, it dies.
Level 18, 23 or 28: Reduced to 15 hit points or fewer.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You reduce a creature to 10 hit points or fewer with an attack using this wand
Level 13 or 18: To 15 hit points or fewer
Level 23 or 28: To 20 hit points or fewer
Effect: The triggering creature dies.

item.title: Orb of Debilitating Languor
item.fluff: This shadowy orb leaves your enemy enfeebled

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with an attack against Fortitude

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack against Fortitude using this implement
Effect: The triggering enemy is slowed (save ends).

item.title: Orb of the Discerning Watcher
item.fluff: This crystalline orb focuses your senses to help you perceive your surroundings better

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against a creature that has not yet acted during this encounter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You would roll Initiative
Effect: Close burst 5 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target can choose to use 10 as the result for their roll for the triggering Initiative check instead of rolling.

item.title: Orb of Far Seeing
item.fluff: You capture the image of your enemy in this translucent sphere, leaving him no place to hide

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Choose a target within 10 squares of you that you can see.
Until the end of the encounter, the chosen creature is considered to be half as far away for the purposes of ranged attacks you make with this orb.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a ranged attack using this orb against the target affected by this orb's encounter power
Effect: The triggering attack does not require line of sight or line of effect to the target, and takes no penalty for concealment, cover or range.

item.title: Orb of Fiery Condemnation
item.fluff: Enemies you face have a tendency of exploding into fire

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You deal fire damage to an enemy using this orb
Effect: The triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 12 or 17: Ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 22 or 27: Ongoing 15 fire damage.

item.title: Orb of Forceful Magic
item.fluff: This transparent orb shimmers and glows with golden energy that you can channel to hurl your enemies about

block.name: Property
block.line: When you pull, push, or sldie an enemy with a power using this orb, you can increase the maximum distance of that forced movement by 1 square.

item.title: Orb of Frustrated Recovery
item.fluff: This scarlet sphere shines with an inner light when you use it to frustrate your enemy's attempts to recover from your attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you saves against ongoing damage
Effect: The triggering enemy instead fails the triggering saving throw.

item.title: Orb of Inevitable Continuance
item.fluff: A sphere of gray crystal that appears as a ball of solid mist

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack made with this orb
Effect: One of your powers that would end and the of your current turn instead lasts until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Orb of Mental Constitution
item.fluff: This rough brown stone reinforces your hardiness with your mental toughness

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An attack targets your AC or Fortitude
Effect: The triggering attack instead targets your Will.
Augment 1: You also gain a +2 power bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
Level 23 or 28: This becomes an augment 2 for a +4 power bonus.

item.title: Orb of Nimble Thoughts
item.fluff: This scarlet crystal lets you move across the battlefield at the speed of thought to avoid your foes' attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You shift a number of squares equal to 2 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Level 13 or 18: Equal to 3 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Level 23 or 28: Equal to 4 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Augment 1: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

item.title: Orb of Psychic Conversion
item.fluff: This clear crystal orb imbues your attacks with psychic energy and channels the pain of psychic damage you take, sending it to your enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make an attack using this orb
Effect: The triggering attack deals psychic damage and gains the Psychic keyword.
If the attack normally deals one or more types of damage, it does not deal damage of those types, and loses the associated keywords.

item.title: Orb of Resilient Tenacity
item.fluff: The constant buzzing whisper that issues from this amethyst orb reinforces your will

block.name: Property
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this orb, choose one effect that a save can end on either you or an ally within 5 squares of you. Saving throws against the chosen effect gain a power bonus equal to this orb's enhancement bonus until that effect ends.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (you or one ally in the burst); The target gains a power bonus to saving throws against one effect of his or her choice until that effect ends. The bonus equals this orb's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Orb of Ultimate Imposition
item.fluff: The will of this orb's wielder imposes great force on an enemy, crippling its power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your orb of imposition class power on a power that ends on a successful save
Effect: The penalty imposed by your orb of imposition increases by -2.

item.title: Orb of Unlucky Exchange
item.fluff: You shift the reflection of your ally into that of your enemy to offer relief by transferring an affliction to that enemy

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit a target with an attack using this orb
Effect: Choose one effect currently affecting you or an ally within 5 squares of you.
You transfer the chosen effect to the triggering target. It is affected for the same duration that you or the ally was affected by it.

item.title: Quickcurse Rod
item.fluff: With this rod, you can curse any creature you can see

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus; If you have the Warlock's Curse class feature and the creature is not under your curse, you place your curse on it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have the Warlock's Curse class feature.
Trigger: You hit a creature with a power using this rod
Effect: You place your curse on a different creature you can see.

item.title: Rain of Hammers Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small, wooden box holds a pair of leaden hammers and a tiny drum you can play to sharpen your ki, accustoming your arms to deliver a steady stream of powerful attacks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer
Effect: Melee 1 (one enemy adjacent to you); The target takes damage equal to twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have hit at least one enemy with an attack during your current turn
Effect: Make an at-will attack against an enemy that you have hit with an attack.
If your attacks have the Full Discipline keyword, this attack is not restricted by it or restrict your other attacks.

item.title: Reclaimer's Totem
item.fluff: When you channel primal energy through this totem and use it to aid a dying comrade, the spirits provide some of their own essence to the effort

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a primal Healing power to restore hit points to a creature that has 0 hit points or fewer, that creature regains an additional 1d6 hit points per plus of this item.

item.title: Roaring Bear Totem
item.fluff: Carved from the great claw of a dire bear, this totem growls like that mighty beast when you channel primal power through it

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a primal attack using this totem
Effect: You knock the triggering enemy prone.

item.title: Rod of Avernus
item.fluff: This brass rod is tipped with a gleaming, red jewel that glows with a yellow aura and as you grasp it, your enemies instinctively cower before you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you gain the benefits of your Pact Boon class feature, you can slide each enemy under your curse 1 square.
Level 23 or 28: Slide 2 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 5 psychic damage.
Level 13 or 18: 10 psychic damage.
Level 23 or 28: 15 psychic damage.

item.title: Rod of Burgeoning Memory
item.fluff: The astral essence in this rod ties you more tightly to your earlier lives as a deva

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if you used your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve an attack roll for this attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve the attack roll of a divine attack power used through this rodd, you add +2 to the roll.

item.title: Rod of Cursed Honor
item.fluff: You can channel the power of your curse when you use this rod, increasing your defenses

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you place your Warlock's Curse on a target, you gain a +1 item bonus to your Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Dark Reward
item.fluff: This rod channels your Warlock's Curse while hardening you against attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you place your Warlock's Curse on an enemy, you gain a +1 item bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Deadly Casting
item.fluff: Infused with destructive magic and covered in death symbols, this rod amplifies lethal magical strikes

block.name: Property
block.line: When you score a critical hit with this rod, you can reroll one of the extra damage dice granted by a critical hit. You must use the second result, even if it is lower.
Level 12 or 17: Two of the dice.
Level 22 or 27: Three of the dice.

item.title: Rod of Elemental Shielding
item.fluff: The gauges on this thick baton are festooned with elemental runes, marking it asn an artificer's implement that augments spells with energy protection

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an Implement power using this rod
Effect: Close burst 1 (you and each ally in the burst); Choose one of acid, cold, fire, or lightning.
Each target gains resist against the chosen damage type equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Level 12 or 17: Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 22 or 27: Equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Rod of Hope Triumphant
item.fluff: As your goe falls, the divine power of this rod invigorates you, for justice has been served

block.name: Property
block.line: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer with a divine attack power using this rod, you gain temporary hit points equal to the three times the rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of the Infernal
item.fluff: This rod enchances one's ability to draw life from enemies when following an infernal pact

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, of +1d10 damage per plus with powers of the Infernal Pact

block.name: Property
block.line: When you trigger your Infernal Pact Boon, you can add the enhancement bonus of the rod to the number of temporary hit points gained.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have the Infernal Pact feature
Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Rod of Office
item.fluff: A badge of office and implement of power, this rod is granted to templars by their sorcerer-kings

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have the Pact Boon feature of the Sorcerer-King Pact class feature.
Effect: You regain the use of your Fell Might.

item.title: Rod of Repair
item.fluff: This rod's wielder shares in the benefits he or she grants to an ally

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an Implement power using this rod
Until the end of your next turn, whenever you use an Arcane Healing power on an ally, you regain a number of hit points equal to twice this rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of Revenge
item.fluff: This rod resembles a short spear carved from black wood and, with it, you can gain the upper hand against any foe that dares to attack you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy hits you
Effect: You gain combat advantage with attacks using this rod against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Smiting
item.fluff: The head of this rod flares outward like a mace, and it weighs heavily in your hand, allowing you to make heavy strikes with it like a weapon

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, or +1d10 force damage per plus when used as a melee weapon

block.name: Property
block.line: This rod can be used as a melee weapon, functioning as the mace simple weapon.
You add its enhancement bonus to the attack rolls and damage rolls of melee Weapon attacks you make with it.

item.title: Rod of the Fickle Servant
item.fluff: This special rod gives you access to a different vestige when you need it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have the Vestige Pact and the Warlock's Curse class features.
Trigger: You hit a creature under your curse with an attack using this rod
Effect: You make one of your primary vestiges your active vestige.

item.title: Scavenger Bird Ki Focus
item.fluff: This onyx statue of a raven with outspread wings helps you not to waste killing strokes upon the dying

block.name: Property
block.line: On a critical hit, any shrouds you chose to invoke before the attack deal 2 extra damage.
Level 12 or 17: Extra 3 damage.
Level 22 or 27: Extra 5 damage.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have the Assassin's Shroud class feature.
Trigger: You hit an enemy with your shrouds on it
Effect: You move all your shrouds on the triggering enemy to another enemy within 10 squares of you (up to the maximum number of shrouds allowed).

item.title: Staff of Divinity
item.fluff: The glowing symbol of a deity rests atop this majestic staff

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when used as a holy symbol

block.name: Property
block.line: A character that has implement proficiency with holy symbols can use this staff as a holy symbol. The implement counts as either a holy symbol or a staff implement when used, not both.

item.title: Staff of Fiery Might
item.fluff: This staff is engraved with fire symbols and is warm to the touch, and it makes fire spells more potent

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 fire damage per plus with Fire attacks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You roll damage for a Fire power and dislike the result
Effect: Reroll a number of dice up to the enhancement bonus of this staff. You must keep the new result even if it is lower, and you cannot reroll the same die more than once.

item.title: Staff of Insightful Detection
item.fluff: Armed with this delicate staff, you can intuit secrets and perceive those who wish to remain hidden

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies don't benefit from concealment or total concealment against your attacks using this staff.
Sustain Minor: You spend 1 power point, and the effect persists until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Staff of Knives
item.fluff: This steel-grey wooden staff transforms into s teel-hard wooden dagger on command

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: 1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus when used as a melee weapon

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: The item transforms from staff into a dagger, or from dagger into a staff.
The item retains its enhancement in both forms, but does not count as a staff implement when in dagger form.

item.title: Staff of Unfailing Talent
item.fluff: This staff resonates with psychic energy as long as it remains in contact with you while you have a reserve of psionic energy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 psychic damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have at least 1 power point remaining

item.title: Staff of the War Mage
item.fluff: This staff, topped with a red crystal, enhances the size of your blast and burst spells

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You use a power that has a blast or burst area of effect
Effect: The size of the triggering burst or blast increases by 1.

item.title: Symbol of Civilization
item.fluff: This coin-like symbol glimmers even though no light shines upon its surface

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you worship a deity of the Civilization domain

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must worship a deity of the Civilization domain.
Trigger: An ally you can see scores a critical hit
Effect: The triggering ally can choose to hit normally to spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Symbol of Divine Force
item.fluff: Through this symbol, you batter foes with relentless conviction

block.name: Property
block.line: On a critical hit with a divine power using this holy symbol, you push the target 1 square.
Level 12 ir 17: Push 2 squares.
Level 22 or 27: Push 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an an enemy with a divine power using this holy symbol
Effect: You push the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with a divine attack using this holy symbol
Effect: You can use an additional Channel Divinity power this encounter, though not the same power twice.
Level 17, 22 or 27: You can also use the same Channel Divinity power.

item.title: Symbol of Excellence
item.fluff: Your devotion to your divine patron inspires others to attain the heights of excellence

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 10 (one ally in burst); The target gains a power bonus to one attack rolls, ability check, or skill of his or her choice before the end of the encounter. The power bonus equals the enchancement bonus of this holy symbol.

item.title: Symbol of Good Fortune
item.fluff: Divine fortune favors you, bolstering your ability to strike accurately at your enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with an attack using this holy symbol
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Symbol of Life
item.fluff: The power of your faith adds energy to your healing prayers

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with Healing attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this holy symbol
Effect: Until the end of your current turn, any creature healed by an encounter or daily power you use regains an additional 1d6 hit points.
Level 12 or 17: Additional 2d6 hit points.
Level 22 or 27: Additional 3d6 hit points.

item.title: Symbol of Resilience
item.fluff: This symbol bolsters confidence and allows allies to shrug off even the deadliest effects

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with an attack delivered with this holy symbol

Effect: Close burst 10 (you or one ally in burst); The target can make a saving throw against one effect a save can end. The target gains a power bonus to the saving throw equal to this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of the First Spirits
item.fluff: An oath of dedication to the natural spirits of the world is incribed in fine script upon this wooden holy symbol

block.name: Property
block.line: A character that has proficiency with totem implements can treat this holy symbol as a totem instead of holy symbol.

item.title: Symbol of the Forge
item.fluff: The crossed hammer and tongs blaze white-hot as you channel your deity's wrath

block.name: Property
block.line: If you worship a deity of the creation domain, the first attack you hit with during an encounter using this symbol deals extra fire damage equal to twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Melee touch (one weapon); The first damage roll made using the target weapon before the end of your next turn gains a bonus equal to this symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Tome of Judicious Conjuration
item.fluff: This tome ensures the longevity of your conjuration spells and also allows you to sustain effects more easily

block.name: Property
block.line: You add the enhancement bonus of this tome to your Will defense when dispel magic is used against one of your conjurations or summons.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You sustain a power that would otherwise require a minor action to do so.

item.title: Tome of Replenishing Flame
item.fluff: This tome's copper biding is pleasantly warm to the touch

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► When you use a wizard Fire power through this tome and that power can be sustained, you regain hit points each time you sustain it. The hit points regained are equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

► This tome contains two wizard daily attack powers with the Fire keyword, chosen when the tome is created. Both powers must be of a level equal or lower than the tome's level. If you have the Arcane Spellbook feature, these powers count as being in your spellbook.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have implement proficiency with this tome.
Effect: Choose a power contained in this tome, and expend an unused arcane daily attack power of an equal or higher level.
You gain the use of the chosen power during this encounter. The power is lost if not used before the end of the encounter.

item.title: Totem of Thunder's Keeper
item.fluff: A stylized face carved into this totem animates with an angry growl to rebuff those who harm your allies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits your spirit companion or an ally within 5 squares of you with a melee attack

Effect: Close burst 10 (triggering enemy); The target takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus, and you push it a number of squares equal to the totem's enhancement bonus.
Level 12 or 17: Thunder damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 22 or 27: Thunder damage equal to 6 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Totem of Trailblazing
item.fluff: This simple stone has the faded image of a campsite painted upon it

item.title: Utility Wand
item.fluff: A boon to practical spellcasters, this wand increases the range of one's utility spells

block.name: Property
block.line: Increase the range of your ranged arcane utility powers and the distance within which you can create the area of an area arcane utility power by a number of squares equal to this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Verdant Staff
item.fluff: This writhing staff is composed of thin vines that constantly flourish and wither

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when used with a primal power

block.name: Property
block.line: A primal character proficient with totem implements can use this staff as a totem implement.

item.title: Vicious Rod
item.fluff: This rod enhances the deadliness of your curse

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a creature under your curse

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal your Warlock's Curse damage, you deal +1 damage for each die.

item.title: Wand of Missile Mastery
item.fluff: This dark wooden staff empowers a wizard's most basic attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When use your magic missile attack power with this implement, you gain an item bonus to the damage equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your magic missile attack power
Effect: You can target one or two creatures with the triggering attack. No target can be more than 5 squares away from any other target.
Level 22 or 27: Target one, two, or three creatures.

item.title: Wrath of Nature Totem
item.fluff: This totem quivers with the pent-up forces of nature, waiting to be released when your wrath is unleashed
